song.title: Summer Storm
song.info:
Hihoooo!
This is
SUMMER STORM
by
MAD GOD
Hey, coming up like a heavy hurricane this tune is going to blow your minds.
Listening instructions:
Imagine yourself standing on the field with an amazing stormfront coming up right next to you. You are taken away by it's power, whirled around and then you are able to reach the top of the clouds. Gazing at th e sun you approach the blue sky...
Or something like that. I know I've got nothing else to do than writing you some stuff like that above. But I looked at that message-window and it was so empty and lonely and... but enough of that.
This tune is the result of the boring Saturday mornings, when I get up, still curing the coma of the last night and the only thing I've got to do is to abuse my computer for tracking music. After the last two "orchestra"-XMs, I thought the time has come again to make something primitive again. So I took my worst and biggest piano-sample, a really bad basedrum and a simple beep-sample and here it is, my newest dance-track. Or whatever you would call that style. Well, finally composing this piece of music took me about one day hard and less hard work.
I hope you enjoy it and we'll see what's next.
I promise: the next one will be an XM again. (less channels and you don't have to spend such a lot of time in reading this damn messages.)
That's it, MAD GOD 01-10-2000 (e-mil: jan.streuffokay.net)
-Ah yes, and don't believe in things trackers tell you who have words like "MAD" in their callsigns.
Cya!
As you can see, I've not been idle for the last few days.
This is:
"Summer Storm"
by MAD GOD
written 08.01.2000 released 10.01.2000
